Uses of Interface
io.ebean.SqlQuery

  • Packages that use SqlQuery 
    Package Description
    io.ebean
    Core API (see Database, DB and Query).

    • Uses of SqlQuery in io.ebean

      Methods in io.ebean that return SqlQuery 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      SqlQuery Database.createSqlQuery​(String sql)
      Deprecated.
      static SqlQuery DB.createSqlQuery​(String sql)
      Deprecated.
      static SqlQuery Ebean.createSqlQuery​(String sql)
      Deprecated.
      SqlQuery SqlQuery.setBufferFetchSizeHint​(int bufferFetchSizeHint)
      A hint which for JDBC translates to the Statement.fetchSize().
      SqlQuery SqlQuery.setFirstRow​(int firstRow)
      Set the index of the first row of the results to return.
      SqlQuery SqlQuery.setLabel​(String label)
      Set a label that can be put on performance metrics that are collected.
      SqlQuery SqlQuery.setMaxRows​(int maxRows)
      Set the maximum number of query results to return.
      SqlQuery SqlQuery.setParameter​(int position, Object value)
      Bind the parameter by its index position (1 based like JDBC).
      SqlQuery SqlQuery.setParameter​(Object value)
      Set the next bind parameter by position.
      SqlQuery SqlQuery.setParameter​(String name, Object value)
      Bind the named parameter value.
      SqlQuery SqlQuery.setParameters​(Object... values)
      Set one of more positioned parameters.
      SqlQuery SqlQuery.setParams​(Object... values)
      Deprecated.
      SqlQuery SqlQuery.setTimeout​(int secs)
      Set a timeout on this query.
      SqlQuery Database.sqlQuery​(String sql)
      Look to execute a native sql query that does not returns beans but instead returns SqlRow or direct access to ResultSet (see findList(RowMapper).
      static SqlQuery DB.sqlQuery​(String sql)
      Look to execute a native sql query that does not returns beans but instead returns SqlRow or direct access to ResultSet (see findList(RowMapper).
      Methods in io.ebean with parameters of type SqlQuery 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void ExtendedServer.findEach​(SqlQuery query, Consumer<SqlRow> consumer, Transaction transaction)
      Execute the SqlQuery iterating a row at a time.
      void ExtendedServer.findEachWhile​(SqlQuery query, Predicate<SqlRow> consumer, Transaction transaction)
      Execute the SqlQuery iterating a row at a time with the ability to stop consuming part way through.
      List<SqlRow> ExtendedServer.findList​(SqlQuery query, Transaction transaction)
      Execute the sql query returning a list of MapBean.
      SqlRow ExtendedServer.findOne​(SqlQuery query, Transaction transaction)
      Execute the sql query returning a single MapBean or null.
